author: Lesley Waters
method: Place the yoghurt, gravlax and dill into a bowl and season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper.  Mix the ingredients well. Spoon the mixture into the canapé shells. To serve, arrange the shells neatly onto a clean plate.
ingredients: 50g/1½oz Greek yoghurt,  50g/1½oz ready-made gravlax, chopped,  1 tbsp chopped fresh dill,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  10 ready-made mini canapé shells
